Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: நட்பிற் குறுப்புக் கெழுதகைமை மற்றதற்கு உப்பாதல் சான்றோர் கடன்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The constituents of friendship are (things done through) the right of intimacy; to be pleased with such a right is the duty of the wise.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: Friendship is visualized as a delicious, hearty meal shared between two people. The main ingredient of this meal is 'familiar freedom' or the right of intimacy ('கெழுதகைமை').
Layered_Composition.Midground: A wise person ('சான்றோர்') is shown adding a pinch of salt to this meal. This salt represents their delight and joyful acceptance of their friend's familiarities ('உப்பாதல்').
Layered_Composition.Background: The addition of this 'salt of acceptance' is shown to make the meal of friendship perfectly flavorful and life-sustaining. It is the essential final ingredient.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Familiar freedom is the very limb of friendship. The duty of the wise is to be the 'salt' that gives it flavor—that is, to delight in it.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: Friendship as a meal, familiar freedom as its substance, and the wise person's acceptance as the essential salt are the three parts of this culinary metaphor.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A warm, inviting, and appetizing light, as if in a cozy kitchen or dining hall. The 'salt of acceptance' can have a subtle, magical sparkle.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A close-up shot that focuses on the symbolic act of adding the salt to the meal of friendship.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with a warm, inviting, still-life quality.
